summary.span: Stellt Typen bereit, die die Serialisierung von XPS-Dokumenten unterstützen.

span.span: Provides types that support serialization of XPS documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Weitere Informationen zu [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]finden Sie in der XML Paper Specification (XPS), die unter [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)verfügbar ist.For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)], see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

related.span: Digitales Signatur Framework der geöffneten Verpackungs Konventionen

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions
